src:
Se registra sismo magnitud preliminar 5.3 al oeste de Pinotepa Nacional
El Centro de Instrumentación y Registro Sísmico informó que el temblor ocurrió a las 23:59 horas de este martes.
06 Nov 2019, 00:08 by Redacción
Esta noche se registró un sismo intensidad leve con magnitud preliminar de 5.3 al suroeste de Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca, de acuerdo con Sismológico Nacional.
El Centro de Instrumentación y Registro Sísmico informó que el temblor ocurrió a las 23:59 horas de este martes.
“El Sasmex detectó un sismo inicialmente en seis estaciones sensoras, que no amerito avisó de alerta a la Ciudad de México”, dicta el CIRES.
text:
Earthquake preliminary magnitude 5.3 is recorded west of Pinotepa Nacional
The Center for Instrumentation and Seismic Registration reported that the quake occurred at 11:59 p.m. on Tuesday.
06 Nov 2019, 00:08 by Drafting
Tonight there was a slight intensity earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 5.3 to the southwest of Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca, according to National Seismology.
The Center for Instrumentation and Seismic Registration reported that the quake occurred at 11:59 p.m. on Tuesday.
"The Sasmex initially detected an earthquake in six sensor stations, which did not warn Mexico City of alert," says CIRES.
